title: Cardano Africa Starter Kit (CASK)
description: Lack of tangible, impactful utility can contribute to low Cardano adoption in Africa and limit its spread across the continent.

title: Planting Roots in Africa
description: Best solutions will come from the ground, but African devs lack infrastructure to push Cardano forward. Cardano community support is needed.

title: iFoncier Land Registry Burkina Faso
description: Burkina Faso is facing acute social tensions and increasingly violent and deadly community conflicts partly due to a failed land management

title: Swahili News, Insight, Onboarding
description: 150 Million people speak Swahili in Africa. There is a need for user friendly content in Swahili.

title: MCA: A Model School in South Africa
description: Utilization and adoption of the Cardano protocol is challenging for children in SA with limited access to computers and technical support.

title: Blockchain powered banking
description: There are more than 1.7 billion adults that are unbanked worldwide. Africa accounts for 17 percent of this figure.

title: P2P:Trade Cardano tokens with Cash
description: How do we increase the adoption and trading of Cardano's Tokens in Africa when 90% of transactions are conducted in cash?

title: LINX: Chat | Connect | Trade
description: AfCFTA plan to unify $3.4T market but 1.3B people cant effectively collab = opportunity cost of $36B of trade & $5B in transaction fees p/y

title: Plutus Lottery ADA Game
description: There are not enough developers in Africa working on projects related to the Cardano Ecosystem.

title: Supply-Chain for Agriculture
description: The local trade is almost driven by a series of middlemen resulting in price inflation in agriculture products. Traceability issues.

title: Enable Digital Governance
description:
1\. No platforms for groups to form consensus and govern themselves in their liking 

2\. Corruption in governance

title: Location, Location, Integration
description: Business and personal addresses are normally not clearly documented, validated nor verified. The is a major hurdle for emerging Africa.

title: Elevating Manufacturing in Africa
description: African producers lack access to market, working capital and supply chains. They can't scale their business and earn income beyond survival.

title: Auto-onboard smallholder farmers
description: 60% of Africa's population is engaged in some kind of agricultural activity. Onboarding smallholder farmers to Cardano lacks incentives.

title: Smart Thrift Savings Wallet
description: Lack of orientation, knowledge & product for personal finance management in Africa. As Access to the internet & cryptocurrencies increases

title: Wutano Token - Africa Health System
description: Millions are without affordable health cover in an inflationary environment of 40 currencies, 54 states and 2000 languages

title: JUNGLE
description: SME's lack the digital infrastructure necessary for them to properly utilize the internet as a tool to compete in the modern marketplace.

title: Transform Africa through Technology
description: Africa lags behind in digital transformation yet economic development is linked to tech and a digital culture; youth unemployment rises.

title: SHiELD Africa, grow Cardano
description: How do we improve the flow of information and productivity in Africa while growing Cardano ecosystem?

title: Cardano Fellows Uganda (CFU)
description: In Uganda, Cardano's visibility and entrepreneurs' understanding of future opportunities are extremely little.

title: Incorporating Non Profits
description: To build a global network to the outreaches of Africa and make existing Network stronger.

title: Sudan ARABIC Cardano Community
description: Sudan is struggling to overcome 30 yrs. of authoritarian rule that has left the economy in tatters  and the country on the brink of collapse

title: Cardano and Christianity for Africa
description: Further economic identity and empowerment, for financial inclusion across the African continent in harmony with Christianity.

title: TheCatalystSchool - Focusing Africa
description: How do we enhance the African community participation in Catalyst process and accelerate Cardano adoption and impact on the continent?

title: Digitised Certificate of Origin
description: Many projects to export goods from Africa fail due to a lack of Certificates of origin.

title: Connect, Trust, Invest : Africa
description: The perception of Africa as backwards and corrupt is holding back development and critical investment in its young & dynamic population

title: Payment with ADA in Ethiopia
description: People don't see the value of ADA since they can't use it in their daily life and are unable to use any of the existing platforms.

title: African Learning Institutions SPOs
description: Africa's population (2019) below 25 yrs old was 60%. Africa is the world's youngest continent. Youth need more opportunities + more support.

title: ADA News in African languages
description: Education about Cardano must be available in native languages in African communities. However, The crypto world is English-speaking oriented

title: Black Rhino
description: Numbers of endangered species continue to rise, and no easy way currently exists to support conservation efforts utilizing blockchain.

title: Fair Pricing for Ethiopian Coffee
description: Lack of traceability in Ethiopian coffee

title: Employment Contract Dapp
description: Lack of formal contracts in developing countries may leave both employers and employees up for exploitation.

title: Farm Management Software in Africa
description: small scale farms are losing competitiveness due to a lack of access to modern farming information

title: Restrictions and barriers
description: Africa continent mostly face with the  challenge of barriers and restrictions on both from the financial institutions and individuals

title: DApp Binding Arbitration Africa
description: African countries have adopted new laws for arbitration of disputes. It is unclear how this will play out in disputes over smart contracts.

title: Identify access to technology
description: Without access to the internet it will prove difficult to provide access to as many people as possible.

title: Global Sustainable Stories/Usecases
description: There should be more of a spotlight on Cardano projects implemented in Africa, their stories, challenges & solutions across the continent.

title: Africa Opensource Pharma & Medicine
description: Drug & medical funding is heavily centralised. Africa lacks investment & solutions despite native scientific talent.

title: Locating Culture
description: Mapping cultural resources in growing regions is critical, but difficult to do without ground truth and location-based imagery.

title: WiFi Hotspots & Internet Cafes
description: Lack of WiFi & availability of affordable computers, available to Africans impedes their progress, we must make it easier & affordable.

title: Cardano Health Infrastructure
description: Lack of ***Secure Healthcare Infrastructure*** to provide needed medical records systems and interoperability to health facilities in Africa.
